name: Verify GET /posts/{id}/comments returns 200 OK and comments for a post
description: This test verifies that the /posts/{id}/comments endpoint returns a 200 OK status and a non-empty array of comments associated with the specified post ID.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that the /posts/{id}/comments endpoint returns a 200 OK status and a non-empty array of comments associated with the specified post ID.

testStage.description: This test verifies that the /posts/{id}/comments endpoint returns a 200 OK status and a non-empty array of comments associated with the specified post ID.

steps.name: Performing GET /posts/{id}/comments request for post ID 1 and validating comments
